Description:
We are seeking an experienced WordPress Developer to join our team in Pakistan. If you have a strong track record of designing and implementing WordPress websites, we want to hear from you.Responsibilities:Develop and maintain WordPress websites, ensuring functionality, performance, and security.
Customize and extend WordPress themes and plugins to meet project requirements.
Collaborate with the design and content teams to implement website updates and enhancements.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues and bugs.
Keep up-to-date with the latest WordPress trends and best practices.
Salary Range Rs 40k- Rs 80kHierarchy:Techbente values a structured hierarchy that reflects our commitment to recognizing and rewarding loyalty and dedication within our organization.The salary structure for Wordpress Developers within the company is as follows:1. **WD1 (Worker Level 1):** The salary for this position is set at Rs 75,000.2. **WD2 (Worker Level 2):** Employees at WD2 level receive a competitive salary of Rs 105,000.3. **WD3 (Worker Level 3):** Those at WD3 level are rewarded with a salary of Rs 175,000, reflecting their dedication and expertise.4. **WD4 (Worker Level 4):** The highest tier within our hierarchy, WD4 employees, are compensated with a substantial salary of Rs 450,000, recognizing their exceptional commitment and contribution to our organization.We believe in fostering a work environment where dedication and commitment are acknowledged and appropriately compensated, allowing our employees to thrive and grow within Techbente.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 2 years of experience in WordPress development.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Elementor & Drag&Drop style Design Development
Strong knowledge of WordPress themes, plugins, and custom post types.
Experience with responsive design and mobile optimization.
Familiarity with SEO best practices.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.
